channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Dumped Waste, 15th October
item.description:
Someone couldn’t be bothered to arrange collection so just discarded their household drying rack here

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Trio Place, The Borough, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Red lights, 15th October
item.description:
Yesterday you had people working on the lights, they seem to of lengthened the red light timings , which now everyone is beeping all day and forcing the lead car to run the red light , I have witnessed many near accidents today due to people running the red light. I will also inform the police as this dangerous
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leinster Terrace, Bayswater, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Taxed but no MOT, 15th October
item.description:
This car (a grey Ford Fiesta with registration number MX18 VGN) has been parked here (unmoved) since at least January 2025.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Rolvenden Gardens, Widmore, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: There has been a big silver van dumped opposite number 24 Lansdowne Rd BR13PQ the number plates have been removed it’s been there a week, 15th October

item.title: Street light - door off, fuse removed light out, 15th October
item.description:
Addison road 54 A1 Door off, fuse removed , light out The illuminated sign near by is also out LBB & TFL all day each other own it. Believe these are linked.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Addison Road, Widmore, London
